mapper.select: select count(1) from integral_alter_record where uid = #{userId} and integral_item = #{item} and create_time between CURDATE() and date_add(CURDATE(), interval 1 day)

select id, credits, `type`, (case integral_item when '1' then '注册' when '2' then '绑车' when '3' then '评论' when '4' then '发帖' when '5' then '分享' when '6' then '服务预约' when '7' then '服务评价' when '8' then '兑吧积分消费成功' when '9' then '兑吧积分消费失败' when '10' then '积分导入' when '100' then '用户完善资料' when '101' then '完善车辆资料' when '21' then '活动发帖' when '22' then '活动点赞'else integral_item end) as integralItem, create_time as createTime from integral_alter_record where uid = #{userId} order by create_time desc
